A new bold and dynamic line is joining the sneakers collection. Featuring an ultra-light upper, the line is inspired by our iconic Day Master sneakers and is perfect for wearing when off-duty. Coming in nylon and calfskin, it features suede details and a rubber label with micro-injection logo:
